Retry an HTTP request with exponential backoff

Source: R/get_raw_enrollment.R
retry_with_backoff.Rd

Retry an HTTP request with exponential backoff

Usage

retry_with_backoff(
  request_fn,
  max_retries = 5,
  base_delay = 1,
  max_delay = 60,
  description = "request"
)

Arguments

request_fn

Function that makes the HTTP request and returns response

max_retries

Maximum number of retry attempts (default 5)

base_delay

Initial delay in seconds (default 1)

max_delay

Maximum delay in seconds (default 60)

description

Description of the request for logging

Value

The HTTP response if successful
